page.title: 05ECONOMICS AND TRADESPEOPLE
page.content:
ECONOMICS IN PRESTON CAPES A sub Post Office opens for 20 hours a week. Council house rents can be paid here. Pensioners who have no transport can remain independent. They use the travelling shops which visit the village and only go out of the village when transport is available.
TRADESPEOPLE The village does not contain any tradespeople but we are well served by those who deliver. Milk from Maidford on alternate days. Baker and grocer from Blakesley on Wednesday and Friday. Butcher from Blakesley weekly. Fresh fish from Flore weekly.
